trans-unit.target: TEXT_AKTKLA202_04140_SEQ_00<tab>Jude is eager to begin work on the starlens.

TEXT_AKTKLA202_04140_SEQ_01<tab>Jude has tasked you with crafting starlens braces.
※Minimum collectability rating for this delivery is 110. Delivering items with a rating of 220 or more will earn greater rewards.
TEXT_AKTKLA202_04140_SEQ_02<tab>You deliver the braces to an appreciative Jude. Now a tiny degree less timid than before, he expects to be able to speak with you again before long.
TEXT_AKTKLA202_04140_TODO_00<tab>Deliver starlens braces to Jude.
TEXT_AKTKLA202_04140_JUDE_100_001<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, let us waste no time in getting to work!
TEXT_AKTKLA202_04140_JUDE_200_001<tab>I would like to ask you to craft starlens braces─they are arguably the most important pieces!

TEXT_AKTKLA202_04140_SYSTEM_300_001<tab>You may now undertake deliveries for the Faculty of Astronomy at the Studium. By delivering the requested items to Jude and raising yourself in his esteem, you can advance the story of his efforts to manufacture a starlens.
TEXT_AKTKLA202_04140_SYSTEM_310_001<tab>Items with a higher collectability will result in greater rewards upon delivery. Speak to Jude to view the Custom Deliveries list.
TEXT_AKTKLA202_04140_JUDE_000_001<tab>Thank you for agreeing to assist. Please deliver the braces here once you've finished.
TEXT_AKTKLA202_04140_JUDE_000_002<tab>You have my sincerest of thanks, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Your efforts have saved me more trouble than you know.
TEXT_AKTKLA202_04140_JUDE_000_003<tab>What stunning craftsmanship! Your talent is incredible─you are a star among stars!
TEXT_AKTKLA202_04140_SYSTEM_000_010<tab>In making your first successful delivery, you have begun to earn Jude's trust.
TEXT_AKTKLA202_04140_SYSTEM_000_011<tab>Deliver the items Jude needs, and deliver them often to improve your standing with the Faculty of Astronomy!
TEXT_AKTKLA202_04140_JUDE_000_050<tab>Thank you. Without your help, I'd have no hope of ever finishing the starlens.
TEXT_AKTKLA202_04140_JEROMERE_000_051<tab>Listen here, Jude. Today I'm going to show you how to make the most of what should be the best summers of your life!
TEXT_AKTKLA202_04140_JEROMERE_000_052<tab>Are you familiar with the concept of barbeques?
TEXT_AKTKLA202_04140_JUDE_000_053<tab>Bar...beques?

TEXT_AKTKLA202_04140_JEROMERE_000_054<tab>It is a culinary practice originating from the archipelagos off the coast of the New World. Various cuts of meat are thoroughly braised over the span of half a day.

TEXT_AKTKLA202_04140_JEROMERE_100_054<tab>Many of our peers prefer studying alone in dreary silence, but that is not so with the poetry club. We gather round the fire of the barbeque, discussing the finer points of literature, reciting poetry as we watch the meat smoke and sear.

TEXT_AKTKLA202_04140_JEROMERE_000_055<tab>Perhaps the flames that sear the meat will finally ignite a fire in your heart large enough to propel you into action. At long last, you will be able to declare your undying love for that homely, yet somehow still alluring girl! What do you say!?
TEXT_AKTKLA202_04140_JUDE_000_056<tab>Honestly, I do not know why you would come to me with such a proposal...
TEXT_AKTKLA202_04140_JEROMERE_000_057<tab>Join our poetry club, Jude. Just have one taste, and you'll realize exactly what you're missing out on!

TEXT_AKTKLA202_04140_JUDE_000_058<tab>Jeromere, you live boldly and elegantly. Unlike you, however, I am a solitary creature. Just the thought of eating across from another is enough to send chills down my spine!
TEXT_AKTKLA202_04140_JEROMERE_000_059<tab>Nonsense! Surely you at least take meals with your peers?
TEXT_AKTKLA202_04140_JUDE_000_060<tab>...You are my only friend.
TEXT_AKTKLA202_04140_JEROMERE_000_061<tab>You jest?
TEXT_AKTKLA202_04140_JUDE_000_062<tab>I never learned how to make friends. They do not teach you that at school...
TEXT_AKTKLA202_04140_JEROMERE_000_063<tab>...
TEXT_AKTKLA202_04140_JEROMERE_000_064<tab>This is but further evidence you mustn't remain here, alone and isolated. I'll continue to visit until I get that through your thick head!
TEXT_AKTKLA202_04140_JUDE_100_064<tab><sigh> Jeromere never fails to impress me.
TEXT_AKTKLA202_04140_JUDE_000_065<tab>He has so many friends who, unlike me, are all outgoing and full of cheer. He seems to be having so much fun...
TEXT_AKTKLA202_04140_JUDE_000_066<tab>If only I could be more like him...
TEXT_AKTKLA202_04140_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_AKTKLA202_04140_A1_000_001<tab>You'll get there.
TEXT_AKTKLA202_04140_A1_000_002<tab>With a bit of effort, you can!
TEXT_AKTKLA202_04140_A1_000_003<tab>Get a hold of yourself!
TEXT_AKTKLA202_04140_JUDE_000_068<tab>You're right. Lamenting my situation will get me nowhere.
TEXT_AKTKLA202_04140_JUDE_000_069<tab>Chin up, Jude! If you're always looking down, you'll forget to look at the stars!
TEXT_AKTKLA202_04140_JUDE_000_070<tab>Eep! P-Please, if you could keep your voice down.
TEXT_AKTKLA202_04140_JUDE_000_071<tab>Chin up, Jude! If you're always looking down you'll forget to look at the stars!
TEXT_AKTKLA202_04140_Q2_000_000<tab>What will you say?
TEXT_AKTKLA202_04140_A2_000_001<tab>Exactly.
TEXT_AKTKLA202_04140_A2_000_002<tab>Think you're witty, huh?
TEXT_AKTKLA202_04140_JUDE_000_073<tab>Thank you. I feel much better now.
TEXT_AKTKLA202_04140_JUDE_000_074<tab>It seems I am beyond help...
TEXT_AKTKLA202_04140_JUDE_000_075<tab>Thank you for that. However, perhaps I would not have needed comforting had your words not cut so deep. I am, after all, an extremely fragile creature.
TEXT_AKTKLA202_04140_JUDE_000_076<tab>That said, we still lack the necessary parts to complete the starlens.
TEXT_AKTKLA202_04140_JUDE_000_077<tab>I still have a few things to take care of, but you'll be hearing from me again before long.
TEXT_AKTKLA202_04140_JUDE_000_078<tab>Thanks to <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> encouragement, my heart which was as weak as a marmot has now grown a bit tougher─tough enough to match pudding!

TEXT_AKTKLA202_04140_SYSTEM_000_079<tab>Jude is pleased with your efforts. He now only considers you to be a <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>Marginally Scary Individual<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var>!
TEXT_AKTKLA202_04140_SYSTEM_000_080<tab>The next quest will be available from Jude upon reaching level 83 as a carpenter, leatherworker, or weaver.
